text: int main ( int argc , char * argv [ ] ) { int i , l , c , s1 , s2 ; int n ; int mat [ MAX ] [ MAX ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = n ; i > 0 ; -- i ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( l = 0 ; l < n ; l ++ ) for ( c = 0 ; c <= l ; c ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & mat [ l ] [ c ] ) ; for ( l = n - 1 ; l >= 0 ; l -- ) for ( c = 0 ; c <= l ; c ++ ) { s1 = mat [ l ] [ c ] + mat [ l + 1 ] [ c ] ; s2 = mat [ l ] [ c ] + mat [ l + 1 ] [ c + 1 ] ; mat [ l ] [ c ] = s1 > s2 ? s1 : s2 ; } printf ( "%d\n" , mat [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
